name: Falling Stars (itch) (Happy Doggo)
description:
collect stars to get to your grandma🌟💫🌟✨

rules:

collect at least 100 stars to be able to run your spaceship. use arrow  keys and space to jump or joystick on the left and jump button on the right if you are playing on mobile device.

❤️ All the art was mad by talented human being Tsoi!!!❤️
